#MERGE
```{r}
merged_data <- data1
for (i in 2:6) {
  merged_data <- merge(merged_data, get(paste0("data", i)), by = "País", all.x = TRUE)
}
```

```{r}
merged_data[is.na(merged_data)] <- 0
```

```{r}
library(writexl)
write_xlsx(merged_data, "Datafinal.csv")
```
